GetProviderRegistry

static NAMESPACE_FDO::IProviderRegistry* FeatureAccessManager::GetProviderRegistry (   )  [static]
 

Static method that gets an object that implements IProviderRegistry.

Returns:
Returns a static instance of an IProviderRegistry object. Throws an instance of FdoClientServicesException * if an error occurs.
